Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class PlayerManager

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.PlayerManager
public class PlayerManager extends Object
PlayerManger keeps track of all information regarding players and their schools. Notify method send changes from PlayerManager to VirtualView.

  • Constructor Details

    • PlayerManager

      public PlayerManager(int numberOfPlayer, Bag bag)
      Constructor PlayerManager creates a new PlayerManager instance. The TEAM is imposed by the game: -)In the 2-player game the first player is on the white team, the second player is on the black team; -)In the 3-player game the first player is on the white team, the second player is on the black team and the third player is on the gray team; -)In the 4-player game the first and second player are on the white team, the third and fourth are on the black team;
      Parameters:
      numberOfPlayer - is the number of user in this game;
      bag - contains the student tokens to be extracted;

  • Method Details

    • initializeSchool

      public void initializeSchool()
      Initialize the school by following the rules of the game: -)2 or 4 players, 7 students at the entrance and 8 towers in the school; -)3 players, 9 students at the entrance and 6 towers in the school;

    • restoreSingleSchool

      public void restoreSingleSchool(int playerRef, int[] studentsEntrance, int[] studentsTable, int towers, boolean[] professors, Team team)
      Restore the school of a player.
      Parameters:
      playerRef - the player reference;
      studentsEntrance - students situated in the entrance in the previous game;
      studentsTable - students situated in the table in the previous game;
      towers - in the previous game;
      professors - in the previous game;
      team - in the previous game;

    • restoreHandAndCoins

      public void restoreHandAndCoins(int playerRef, ArrayList<Assistant> cards, int coins)
      Restore cards and coins of a player.
      Parameters:
      playerRef - the player reference;
      cards - int the hand of the player in the previous game;
      coins - of the player in the previous game;

    • playCard

      public void playCard(int playerRef, Assistant card, ArrayList<Assistant> alreadyPlayedAssistant) throws NotAllowedException
      Check if the card chosen by the player is valid, then remove it from the list
      Parameters:
      playerRef - the player reference;
      card - the card reference;
      alreadyPlayedAssistant - list of just played cards in this turn;
      Throws:
      NotAllowedException - throw in case of an already played card or the player doesn't have the card in his hand;

    • checkIfCardsFinished

      public boolean checkIfCardsFinished(int playerRef)
      Check if the player has played his last card
      Parameters:
      playerRef - the player reference;
      Returns:
      if player has finished his cards;

    • checkVictory

      public Team checkVictory()
      In a condition of game over, this method check which team have won this match. In case of equal number of towers and professors, the player who is positioned in the lower index cell in the 'players' list wins
      Returns:
      the team winner

    • transferStudent

      public void transferStudent(int playerRef, int colour, boolean inSchool, boolean special) throws NotAllowedException
      Move student of a colour from entrance to table and check if is case of give the professor of that colour to the players. Otherwise, remove the student of a colour from the school and that's it.
      Parameters:
      playerRef - the player reference;
      colour - the colour reference;
      inSchool - boolean indicating if the student have to place in school or not;
      special - boolean indicating if special2 is active;
      Throws:
      NotAllowedException - throw in case of player doesn't have that student's colour in his entrance or his table is full of that student's colour;

    • setStudentEntrance

      public void setStudentEntrance(int playerRef, int colour, int studentsOfThisColor)
      Set student in the entrance of a player.
      Parameters:
      playerRef - the player reference;
      colour - the colour reference;
      studentsOfThisColor - is the number of students to set in the entrance;

    • removeStudentEntrance

      public void removeStudentEntrance(int playerRef, int colour) throws NotAllowedException
      Remove student from entrance of a player.
      Parameters:
      playerRef - the player reference;
      colour - the colour reference;
      Throws:
      NotAllowedException - throw in case of player doesn't have that student's colour in his entrance;

      a boolean that if is true, the game is over;

      public boolean checkStudentsEntranceForSpecial(ArrayList<Integer> students, int playerRef)
      Check if a player has the student chosen in his entrance. Used by special7 and special10.
      Parameters:
      students - a list of student's colour to check presence in school;
      playerRef - the player reference;
      Returns:
      if the operation was successful;
